Bevel Clear Shave Gel

*20% OFF APPLIED AT CHECKOUT

Shave With Precision and Comfort. The Bevel Clear Shave Gel is a non-foaming formula that gives you visibility, glide, and protection for every shave.

Why You’ll Love It:

  • See What You’re Shaving: Clear gel makes edging and detailing precise.

  • Smooth Glide: Provides lubrication for a more comfortable shave.

  • Reduces Irritation: Helps prevent nicks, cuts, and razor burn.

  • Nourishing Formula: Infused with aloe vera and cucumber extract to soothe and hydrate.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

GET CLOSER

With Bevel Clear Shave Gel, you’ll experience foamless precision with increased comfort. Made to help reduce the chances of nicks, cuts, and irritation with every shave.

FOR BEST USE

Squeeze a dime-sized amount of Shave Gel onto your fingers. Apply in a circular motion to cover areas you plan to shave, using more product as needed. Shave with the grain in slow, short glides. Rinse with cold water, pat dry and apply Bevel Bump Control After Shave.

Full Ingredients

Water, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance, Menthyl Lactate, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyquaternium-39, Chlorphenesin, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bisabolol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract.
